title: So how do you earn blue essence in this update?
body: I know you used to get IP every game. I now noticed that I am not earning blue essence at the end of my games. So I am wondering how you earn blue essence now.

replies.body: The way you get blue essence hasn't changed, you just have more opportunities to get it! You can disenchant shards to get BE and can sometimes get some from just opening chests or capsules.
What lies! What he means is you cant earn blue essence you have to level up and disenchant them. You only then get 1200 blue essence
Which part was a lie though? You can still disenchant shards for BE and those level capsules *can* just give you flat essence as well as shards. Care to elaborate on where you thought I was lying?

you honestly made it easier to level up pre-30 which was already done for that on nearly 3 or 4 seperate occasions throughout the last 3 years. yet you made it that much more difficult to obtain champions. you likely delayed people playing ranked games tremendously because they wont have the champions to play it unless they spend RP likely to obtain them. this is nothing more than a cash grab while completely randomizing champion acquisition and turning it into a grind.

you likely wont see too many veterans leave or ones who have already basically obtained everything they needed by now and are basically unaffected by this as much as ones still trying to obtain them. the ones who were still looking to get some champs likely wont play as much. newer players will find it nearly impossible to get the champions they want through leveling to 30 and likely give it up or give you 10 dollars cash for some RP to buy it which is your ultimate intent behind this. when your core base and numbers of daily players go down and new players signing up decreases over time as well. then we will get some more riot speech as you proved through your response to be pretty good at as a riot employee. about well we're doing this to help the community blah blah blah while not coming out saying we did this for a money grab we lost gamers across the board here's a capsule for staying with us and some new icon for coming back.... i can see it now. been through enough changes personally in this game throughout the years and every single one was not for the community but the companies revenue in some way or form. all have been labeled otherwise. in the same way you're saying right now about more forms to obtain it when in reality its actually less not only in ways but in amounts as well. hopefully tryndamere doesnt quit his day job because theres not another company in the world that will take on decision making like this when he gets the results he is bound to get from this change. you're honestly much better off giving some essence per game whether it be in form of in wins only and dialing it down so players get something then can obtain the rest of the difference through the capsules and shards than you are removing it completely from per game. then you can go feed your BS about giving you more ways to obtain it and people would probably buy that nonsense.

I'd have to agree. It's almost infuriating that I can no longer get IP, and now BE, from matches. Instead I get a randomized champion that I nine times out of ten don't want whatsoever. I keep thinking about these things, and how unfair it seems.

1.  You can no longer decide what champion you wish to purchase next. 
   * Because you can't earn the currency in which to buy them.
2.  You can only get the champ you directly want with Riot Points.
   * Riot Points are ridiculously expensive point-per-dollar, and I have bills to pay. I thought this was a _free_ game?
3. It takes 3k+ BE to upgrade a champion to a higher level.
   * It previously only took 500+ IP.
4. Disenchanting champion shards given to you in level capsules is about 1/3 of what the champion costs in the first place.
   * It took you FOREVER to get that level capsule, only to earn . . . how much BE from it? Not enough? Probably.

Nonetheless, I, and many others, are thoroughly displeased.
